title: Meridian falls under PN17 as auditor refrains from expressing opinion on financial statements
summary:
Meridian Bhd was classified as a Practice Note 17 (PN17) affected listed issuer on Monday after the property developer's external auditor expressed a disclaimer of opinion in its audited financial statements for the period ended Sept 30, 2023.

A disclaimer of opinion simply means that an auditor does not express an opinion.
